img_above_text:
![Wukong Pagoda 108.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/24/Wukong_Pagoda_108.jpg)
Head up the slope full of Frozen Corpses to the large forested area full of rocks. A golden trail will soon appear leading straight ahead and up a broken stairway to the Warding Temple on the hill, but there's an optional area to consider first off to the left.
img_below_text:
Exploring this large rock-filled forest, you'll find a lot of Frozen Corpses that will come to lift, and more than a few plants to harvest as well.
![Wukong Pagoda 110.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5f/Wukong_Pagoda_110.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 105 from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Pagoda 108.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/24/Wukong_Pagoda_108.jpg)
Head up the slope full of Frozen Corpses to the large forested area full of rocks. A golden trail will soon appear leading straight ahead and up a broken stairway to the Warding Temple on the hill, but there's an optional area to consider first off to the left."
            - Following Text: "Exploring this large rock-filled forest, you'll find a lot of Frozen Corpses that will come to lift, and more than a few plants to harvest as well.
![Wukong Pagoda 110.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5f/Wukong_Pagoda_110.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing the player character facing off against a large, menacing Frozen Corpse in a snowy, rock-filled forest. This encounter occurs in an optional area off to the left of the main path leading to the Warding Temple. The surrounding environment is covered in snow, with large boulders and sparse vegetation. The image serves to illustrate the challenging combat and exploration elements within this optional area, as described in the preceding and following text.
